en.title: OpenAI Announces GPT-5 Launch Date Set for August 2025
en.summary: OpenAI officially confirms GPT-5 will be released in August 2025, featuring breakthrough multimodal capabilities and significantly improved reasoning abilities.

zh.title: OpenAI宣布GPT-5将于2025年8月正式发布
zh.summary: OpenAI官方确认GPT-5将于2025年8月发布，具备突破性多模态能力和显著提升的推理能力。

en.title: Google Gemini 2.0 Achieves New Breakthrough in Mathematical Reasoning
en.summary: Google's Gemini 2.0 model demonstrates unprecedented performance in complex mathematical problem solving, surpassing human expert level.

zh.title: 谷歌Gemini 2.0在数学推理领域取得新突破
zh.summary: 谷歌Gemini 2.0模型在复杂数学问题解决方面展现出前所未有的性能，超越人类专家水平。
